title: Limbo (v1.8|Android)
description:
== About the game:

Uncertain of his sister's fate, a boy enters LIMBO.
Guide a boy through dark locations full of many traps and deadly hazards. Find a safe path for the hero. The protagonist of this Android game is a boy who goes searching for his missing sister. He finds himself in limbo. The boy is surrounded by dark scenery and scary creatures like giant spiders. Guide your hero through gloomy forests, the ghost town, and other locations. Jump over obstacles, jump onto platforms, avoid monsters, and find hero's sister.

Game won more than 100 awards...


== Features:
Original minimalistic graphics
Great sound
Interesting levels
Absorbing gameplay


== Version:
Limbo v1.8 from April 24, 2015
Two versions (use only one): For Android 2.3+ and for Android 4.3+ 
Full Release


== Version changes:
- minor improvements


== Instructions:
1. Extract 7z file (7zip - link below) 
2. Depending on your device (2.3+ or 4.0+) copy from folders "2.3 and up" and "4.0 and up", respectively. Install.
3. Copy folder "com.playdead.limbo.full" to SDCARD/ANDROID/OBB (sometimes device/android/obb)
If OBB doesn't exist create it 
Play & enjoy!


== System Requirements:
Android 2.3+ or 4.3+ 


== Links:
Download 7-Zip http://www.7-zip.org/download.html 
 


          If you enjoyed the game then share with others by seeding!
               Support game development and buy the game!


Game made by 
Playdead
